languages.text: Тогда, облачишися во флак-сутаны, начерташи восхваления Богу-Императору на тактических визорах своих, вышли воины Ордена Молота, готовые для бранного служения. Язвили они незванных чужаков лазружьями и болтерами, побивали цепными мечами и силовыми цепами, и жатву кровавую и обильную собрали в тот день.

Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.
languages.original_text: Тогда, облачишися во флак-сутаны, начерташи восхваления Богу-Императору на тактических визорах своих, вышли воины Ордена Молота, готовые для бранного служения. Язвили они незванных чужаков лазружьями и болтерами, побивали цепными мечами и силовыми цепами, и жатву кровавую и обильную собрали в тот день.

traits.locale_text: The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer put on their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer put on their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

The brethren and sisters of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

languages.text: Entonces los guerreros de la Orden del Martillo vistieron sus capuchas protectoras, equipadas con visores inscritos con loas al Dios Emperador, y marcharon, listos para servir en combate. Sus rifles láser y sus bólters perforaron a los intrusos y sus espadas sierra y sus mayales de energía los golpearon. Aquel día se derramó mucha sangre.
languages.original_text: Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

traits.locale_text: Los hermanos de la Orden del Martillo vistieron sus capuchas protectoras, equipadas con visores inscritos con loas al Dios Emperador, y marcharon a servir en combate. Sus rifles láser y sus bólters perforaron a los intrusos y sus espadas sierra y sus mayales de energía los golpearon. Aquel día se derramó mucha sangre.

languages.text: 重锤修会的战士们戴上了兜帽，在战术面甲上刻下了赞美神皇的话语，之后便投身战斗之中。他们用激光枪与爆矢枪刺穿了外来者，用链锯剑和动力链枷猛击他们。那一天，他们收获了辉煌而血腥的战果。
languages.original_text: Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

traits.locale_text: 圣锤修会的修士与修女们戴上了兜帽，在战术面甲上刻下了赞美神皇的话语，之后便投身战斗之中。他们用激光枪与爆矢枪刺穿了外来者，用链锯剑和动力链枷猛击他们。那一天，他们收获了辉煌而血腥的战果。

languages.text: Dann legten die Krieger des Ordens des Hammers ihre Flakkukullen ab, schrieben Worte des Lobes für den Gottimperator auf ihre taktischen Visoren und schickten sich an, in der Schlacht zu dienen. Mit Lasergewehren und Boltern durchbohrten sie die Eindringlinge, streckten sie nieder mit Kettenschwertern und Energieflegeln. Und so fuhren sie an jenem Tag eine gleichsam üppige wie blutige Ernte ein.
languages.original_text: Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

traits.locale_text: Die Brüder und Schwestern des Ordens des Hammers legten ihre Flakkukullen ab, schrieben Worte des Lobes für den Gottimperator auf ihre taktischen Visoren und schickten sich an, in der Schlacht zu dienen. Mit Lasergewehren und Boltern durchbohrten sie die Eindringlinge, streckten sie nieder mit Kettenschwertern und Energieflegeln. Und so fuhren sie an jenem Tag eine gleichsam üppige wie blutige Ernte ein.

languages.text: Les guerriers de l'Ordre du Marteau revêtent alors leurs capuches pare-balles et inscrivent des litanies de louange à l'Empereur-Dieu sur leurs visières tactiques. Ils partent faire leur office au combat. Ils percent la chair des intrus avec leurs fusils laser et leurs bolters. Ils les frappent de leurs épées tronçonneuses et de leurs fléaux énergétiques. Et une ample moisson de sang est récoltée ce jour-là.
languages.original_text: Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

traits.locale_text: Les guerriers de l'Ordre du Marteau revêtent alors leurs capuches pare-balles et inscrivent des litanies de louange à l'Empereur-Dieu sur leurs visières tactiques. Ils partent faire leur office au combat. Ils percent la chair des intrus avec leurs fusils laser et leurs bolters. Ils les frappent de leurs épées tronçonneuses et de leurs fléaux énergétiques. Et une ample moisson de sang est récoltée ce jour-là.

languages.text: それから鉄槌の修道会の戦士達は防弾頭巾で身を固め、戦術バイザーに神帝陛下を讃える言葉を刻み、戦いに身を投じる準備を整えて出陣した。戦士達は侵入者をラスガンとボルターで突き刺し、チェーンソードとパワーフレイルで襲撃する。その日、大規模な血の海を見ることになった。
languages.original_text: Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

traits.locale_text: それから鉄槌の修道会の戦士達は防弾頭巾で身を固め、戦術バイザーに神帝陛下を讃える言葉を刻み、戦いに身を投じる準備を整えて出陣した。戦士達は侵入者をラスガンとボルターで突き刺し、チェーンソードとパワーフレイルで襲撃する。その日、大規模な血の海を見ることになった。

languages.text: Ardından Çekiç Tarikatı'nın savaşçıları; savar cübbelerini kuşandılar, taktiksel vizörlerine Tanrı İmparator'a dair övgü sözcükleri işlediler ve dinî hizmetlerini muharebede gerçekleştirmek adına ileri atıldılar. Mütecavizleri silazerler ve bulonatalarla delik deşik ettiler, motorlu kılıçları ve gürzleriyle ezdiler. O gün büyük, kanlı bir hasat yapıldı.
languages.original_text: Then the warriors of the Order of the Hammer donned their flak-cowls, inscribed words of praise to the God-Emperor on their tactical visors, and went forth, ready to render service in battle. With lasguns and bolters they pierced the interlopers, with their chainswords and power flails they struck them, and a great and bloody harvest was reaped that day.

traits.locale_text: Ardından Çekiç Tarikatı'nın savaşçıları; savaş cübbelerini kuşandılar, taktiksel vizörlerine Tanrı İmparator'a dair övgü sözcükleri işlediler ve dinî hizmetlerini muharebede gerçekleştirmek adına ileri atıldılar. Mütecavizleri lazer ve bulon silahlarıyla delik deşik ettiler, motorlu kılıçları ve gürzleriyle ezdiler. O gün büyük, kanlı bir hasat yapıldı.
